title: Seminole Wind
description: Billy Brightpath is the first Seminole Indian in history to be awarded the Congressional Medal of Honor. When he comes home to South Florida after 24 years in the military, Brightpath discovers that a sugar industry baron has taken control of the family ranch and he has to fight to regain what is rightfully his.When his true love from the past enters the picture, Brightpath is torn between being with the woman he loves and killing the man he hates. Then a hired killer and the FBI enter the story and things really start popping.SEMINOLE WIND is a story of romantic adventure filled with action and intrigue, set in the beauty of the Florida Everglades. Its colorful characters offer fast paced action, laughs, and a true emotion that suits the taste of both male and female readers alike.
author: K.T. Dixon
